channel.title: LruCache on ExampleSite
channel.description: Recent content in LruCache on ExampleSite

item.title: How to load and cache images from URL to RecyclerView without using 3rd party libraries
item.description: What is the goal? In the last post, I demonstated how to create a RecyclerView and load data from the external API, particularly we used Picasso library to load and cache images for us. In this post I will show how to mannually do that without use of any libraries. For the purpose of easy reading, I will start from the begging and go through all the steps one more time.
